content: Hi everyone! I'm Eric. I've been a fan of Rust for a long time (I was an intern on the Rust team years ago). I'm really excited that I'm going to start working on Rust full time again. Anyway, I just wanted to say hi. I'm really looking forward to reconnecting with the community!
@eholk Welcome back! Delighted to hear that you'll be working on Rust full-time :)
Thanks! Good to see you again. I'm really excited to be back on Rust :)

Hi, please anyone help me. I'm absolutely newbie in Programming, I don't know how to write any program, never learnt any programming language before. I would like suggestion about a good book for RUST beginners.

Robson Herrera said:

Hi, please anyone help me. I'm absolutely newbie in Programming, I don't know how to write any program, never learnt any programming language before. I would like suggestion about a good book for RUST beginners.

The rust discord server is a better place to ask beginner questions. As for a book, *the* book is a good choice :)
